decisions.name: Copy_1_of_If_User_Has_Survey_Edit_Access
decisions.label: Copy 1 of If User Has Survey Edit Access

formulas.name: businessScale_View_Formula
errorText_EmergencyContact_Phone1
formulas.expression: IF({!validate_EmergencyContact_Phone1} == FALSE, "Please start the phone number with 628 and input 10-14 digit, numeric only.", "")

formulas.name: errorText_EmergencyContact_Phone2
formulas.expression: IF({!validate_EmergencyContact_Phone2} == FALSE, "Please start the phone number with 628 and input 10-14 digit, numeric only.", "")

formulas.name: errorText_EmergencyContact_RT
formulas.expression: IF({!validate_EmergencyContact_RT} == FALSE, "Emergency Contact RT must be a 3-digit numeric value (e.g., 001).", "")

formulas.name: errorText_EmergencyContact_RW
formulas.expression: IF({!validate_EmergencyContact_RW} == FALSE, "Emergency Contact RW must be a 3-digit numeric value (e.g., 001).", "")

validationRule.errorMessage: Please input 3-80 character, alphabet only.

Please check the following error:

- Alphabet and Special character are not allowed, for example / \ :*?"<>|

- must be a 3-digit numeric value (e.g., 123).

Please check the following error:

- Alphabet and Special character are not allowed, for example / \ :*?"<>|

- must be a 3-digit numeric value (e.g., 123).

textTemplates.name: tpl_EmergencyContact_City
textTemplates.text: Select Id,Name, code__c from City_Master_Data__c where province_code__c = '{!editor_Emergency_Contact_Province.selectedChoiceValues}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_EmergencyContact_Kecamatan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from District_Master_Data__c where city_code__c = '{!func_EmergencyContact_GetCity}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_EmergencyContact_Kelurahan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where district_code__c = '{!func_EmergencyContact_GetKecamatan}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_EmergencyContact_ZipCode
textTemplates.text: Select Zip_Code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where code__c = '{!func_EmergencyContact_GetKelurahan}'
